title: High Tunnel Water Collection with Cherry Flowers

tasks.task: Constructing a high tunnel and implementing sustainable water management systems
subtasks: Assembling a 30 by 32 high tunnel structure
Selecting warm season crops such as tomatoes, peppers, and eggplant for planting in the high tunnel
Experimenting with less common hot season crops like ginger and turmeric in the high tunnel
Setting up aquaponics and hydroponics systems within the high tunnel
Implementing succession planting strategies in the high tunnel
Installing gutters on both sides of the high tunnel to capture rainwater
Placing rain barrels at the west side of the high tunnel to store collected water
Setting up a pump powered by household electricity or solar energy to move water
Connecting the pump to a drip irrigation system for efficient water delivery to plant roots
Adjusting irrigation practices to avoid overhead watering and reduce leaf moisture, which can lead to disease

tasks.task: Applying for and managing a SARE grant for water conservation
subtasks: Researching and preparing grant materials for a SARE grant application
Securing funding through the SARE grant to install the water capture system
Monitoring and maintaining the water capture system's performance and capacity
